title: Trade Deadline Buzz w/Mike Garafolo + TNF Preview
itunes:title: Trade Deadline Buzz w/Mike Garafolo + TNF Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all the latest news from around the league. Mike Garafolo joins to discuss the headlines, starting with the Colts' decision to bench Matt Ryan for Sam Ehlinger (7:30). Then, the heroes move to the AFC East and cover the injuries to Breece Hall and Alijah Vera-Tucker and the acquisition of James Robinson (12:50) before talking about the mess in the Patriots' quarterback room (18:35). After the break, the heroes run through possible trade targets ahead of next week's deadline, including Brandin Cooks (24:25), Chase Claypool (28:26), and Jerry Jeudy (30:08). Finally, the heroes look ahead to Week 8's Thursday night game and predict a winner between the Ravens and Buccaneers (40:56).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
